text: The east side of the factory The Mechanische Baumwollspinnerei und Weberei () is a cotton mill in Augsburg, Bavaria, Germany. It was founded in 1837 and was considered one of the oldest textile manufacturing companies in Germany. It was closed in 1989. ==External links== * Category:Buildings and structures in Augsburg Category:Cotton mills Category:Textile mills in Germany
title: Mechanische Baumwollspinnerei und Weberei Augsburg
